sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { accounts = [ { name: 'Master Account', status: 'active' }, { name: 'Testaccount', status: 'inactive' }, { name: 'Hidden Account', status: 'unknown' } ]; onAccountAdded(newAccount: {name: string, status: string}) { this.accounts.push(newAccount); } onStatusChanged(updateInfo: {id: number, newStatus: string}) { this.accounts[updateInfo.id].status = updateInfo.newStatus; } }
